html: (2 Nephi 19:4)."As in the day of Midian." Just as the Lord had delivered the Midianites into the hands of Gideon, so shall He release Israel from future bondage through His power. (See Judges 7:7-25.) The omission of this phrase in the Book of Mormon is noticeable. Monte Nyman states: "This could have been an intentional omission by Nephi, as it did not apply to his people." (GAWI, 68.)
